titleStmt.title: Reason and authority, or, The motives of a late Protestants reconciliation to the Catholic Church together with remarks upon some late discourses against transubstantiation.
titleStmt.author: Basset, Joshua, 1641?-1720.
Gother, John, d. 1704.

notesStmt.note: Written by Joshua Basset. Ascribed in error to John Gother. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
